    one (1) of Accounting, Business Management, Government, 
Geography or Statistics.  
(xxv) UNN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other 
relevant subjects.  
(xxvi) ILORIN requires one (1) of the two (2) other subjects from 
Accounting, Commerce, Business Methods, Geography, 
Statistics and Government.  
(xxvii) FUNAAB requires 'O' level credit passes in two (2) other 
relevant subjects from any of Government, Geography, 
Commerce, Physics, History or Statistics.  
(xxviii) NDA requires the two (2) other subjects from Accounting, 
Commerce, Geography, History, French, Arabic and 
Government.  
(xxxix) UMYUK requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) from 
Commerce, Government, Geography, Accounting/ Book 
Keeping, Marketing or Insurance at not more than two (2) 
sittings.  
(xl) FED-LAFIA requires 'O' le vel credit passes in Government 
and any of one (1) of Commerce, History, Christian Religious 
Studies or Islamic Studies as the two (2) other subjects.  
(xli) AAUA requires Five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) of  
Government, Geography , Accounting , Commerce and  
History.  
(xlii) CHRISTOPHER accepts 'O' level credit passes in any two (2) 
subjects as the fourth (4th) and fifth (5th) subjects.  
(xliii) BELLS requires five (5) 'O' level credits at one (1) or two (2) 
sittings which must include English Language, Mathematics, 
Economics and any other two (2) subjects.    
(xliv) FED-DUTSINMA requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) 
of Arts, Social Science and Science subjects.  
(xlv) PAN-ATLANTIC requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
including English Language, Mathematics/ Economics/ 
Accounting/ Commerce and other relevant subjects.  
(xlvi) COAL-CITY requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any two (2) of Arts 
or Social Sciences subjects.
